alert.note: Alert for Adams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 9:37AM EST until January 03 at 11:52PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Ohio Brush Creek near West Union. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio Brush Creek near West Union. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Water spills onto Route 348, while several county or township roads near Lawshe and low areas east of West Union near the creek are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage by early afternoon and reach a maximum value of 18.2 feet late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
